instruction: Find an article related to the latest trends in artificial intelligence.
output: Here is an article discussing the latest trends in artificial intelligence: https://venturebeat.com/2021/02/15/5-major-trends-driving-the-future-of-ai-in-2021/  This article discusses the five major trends driving AI in 2021 such as natural language processing and data privacy, and how they will impact the development of AI to come.
